channel.title: Can someone help me prevent cheat clienters?
channel.description:
Hey i have a small problem thats been bugging me for ages. i use an old clean pi and managed to get players on it But there is this one person that keeps logging on using his cheat client, duping and droping rares on the floor which is ruining everything.
I've tried reading the tut made by deathchaos but it just gave me some errors i couldnt fix.
Can anyone help me out? if you are willing to please reply.

item.title: Can someone help me prevent cheat clienters?
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:3, topic:431745”]I think, that tut from Deathchaos is for Delta servers, that UID stuff

@jaruanna, Nice edit after my post lol…[/quote]

I didn’t edit my post…

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help me prevent cheat clienters?
